column4: hey - I installed ndiswrapper from source back when this computer was edgy, and I'm tired of it not working every time there's a kernel update. Can someone help me - how do you install ndiswrapper the right way so it updates along with the kernel?
remove it, and then apt-get install ndiswrapper
I looked in synaptic and there wasn't a package called ndiswrapper, just a bunch of support utils for it
